text: Diana Garrigosa Laspeñas (10 November 1944 – 10 February 2020) was a Spanish Catalan economist and teacher. She was married to the 127th President of the Generalitat of Catalonia Pasqual Maragall. After her husband was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease, she founded the Pasqual Maragall Foundation for research of the disease. She served as the foundation's president from 2008 until her death in 2020. She starred in the 2010 documentary movie Bicicleta, cullera, poma with her husband. Garrigosa was born in Barcelona. She married Maragall in 1965. On 10 February 2020, Garrigosa died due to a heart attack in Barcelona. She was 75. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish academics Category:People from Barcelona Category:Spanish economists
title: Diana Garrigosa
